meanings.sent1: The partygoers danced all night long.
meanings.sent2: The partygoers enjoyed the delicious food at the gathering.
meanings.sent3: The partygoers laughed and chatted happily at the event.
meanings.sent4: The partygoers brought life to the celebration with their energy.
meanings.sent5: The partygoers made the room vibrant with their presence.

meanings.definition: Those who go to social gatherings.
meanings.sent1: The excited partygoers arrived at the social event.
meanings.sent2: The partygoers mingled and socialized with ease.
meanings.sent3: The partygoers shared stories and jokes at the gathering.
meanings.sent4: The partygoers were like social butterflies, flitting from group to group.
meanings.sent5: The partygoers added a lively atmosphere to the gathering.
